name: elch-js
description: A tiny templating engine written in typescript

scripts.build: mkdir dist & npm run lint && npm run browserify && npm run polish
scripts.browserify: browserify src/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --target es5 ] --standalone Elch | uglifyjs  > dist/elch.js
scripts.watchify: watchify src/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --target es5 ] --standalone Elch -o dist/elch.js -v

author: Paul
